articles.author: Dustin Long
articles.title: Multiple Cup teams with pit crew changes for Phoenix - NASCAR on NBC Sports
articles.description: Teams making changes include those of Christoper Bell, Martin Truex Jr. and Daniel Suarez.
articles.content:
AVONDALE, Ariz. Five Cup teams will have changes to their pit crews for todays race at Phoenix Raceway.
